solution_line_template: The bag full of sand would weigh {full_bag_weight} * {fill_percent} = <<{full_bag_weight}*{fill_percent}={sand_weight}>>{sand_weight} pounds
The filling material would make it {sand_weight} * {heavier_percent} = <<{sand_weight}*{heavier_percent}={extra_weight}>>{extra_weight} pounds heavier
